title: Create An Android App Start To Finish
description:
It was recently requested that I show how to create an Android app from start to finish using a text editor and command line. Although the process isnâ€™t difficult, it might not be so straight forward for a first time developer. The scope of this article should cover the following:

  • How to create a new Android project using a terminal window
  • Creating a signing keystore for deployment to the app store
  • How to submit to the app store and be successful

The post Create An Android App Start To Finish appeared first on The Polyglot Developer.
